dcterms:creator: C. F.
dcterms:description: A simulation platform for mobile crowd-sensing in urban environments, used to generate realistic datasets for testing adversarial task detection methods.
dcterms:title: CrowdSenSim

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
B. Kantarci
dcterms:description: Dataset containing fake sensing tasks generated by low-capacity adversaries, used to evaluate detection methods for original fake tasks.
dcterms:title: OriginalDataset (Fake Sensing Tasks by low-capacity adversaries)

dcterms:creator: Z. Chen
B. Kantarci
dcterms:description: Dataset containing fake sensing tasks generated by high-capacity adversaries using Generative Adversarial Networks, used to evaluate detection methods for adversarial fake tasks.
dcterms:title: GAN Dataset (Fake Sensing Tasks by high-capacity adversaries)
